title: When will the new session start at GMC Bhopal this year? - Quora

response.answer_text: The typical sessions used to start around mid September or early October at Gandhi Medical College but it is set to change with the new allotment and counselling protocols that are set to be implemented soon. Please stay in touch with the college's dedicated student section which handles all the student related issues and grievances for your queries. You can get the required contact information from the official website.
